ack.p: We gratefully acknowledge financial support from VELUX FONDEN (33813), the Danish National Research Foundation (CENPERM DNRF100), the Carlsberg Foundation (J.H. _2012_01_0286) and the Augustinus Foundation (Northern Worlds). Special thanks to Prof. Peter Westh from the Department of Science, Systems and Models, Roskilde University and to the Greenlandic National Museum staff for help with fieldwork and logistics
